Cartoon of Voronsky by N. Gatilov, 1927
Cartoon drawn by N. Gatilov, "Vecherniaia Moskva, 1927, 26 February, № 47 (958), p. 3. "At the evening devoted to the Fifth Anniversary of "Krasnaia nov" Cde. Rakovsky told how Voronsky was once in command of troops for two days."

On Voronsky's cap: "Krasnaia nov'"'; on his chest: "Prozhektor"; on his belt: Krug Publishing House; on his saber: Art -- the cognition of life; on his boots: Pereval and the Union of Writers.
